thread.title: vivo V5 Plus goes up for pre-order in Malaysia ahead of India launch
thread.title_full: vivo V5 Plus goes up for pre-order in Malaysia ahead of India launch

title: vivo V5 Plus goes up for pre-order in Malaysia ahead of India launch
text:
vivo V5 Plus goes up for pre-order in Malaysia ahead of India... vivo V5 Plus goes up for pre-order in Malaysia ahead of India launch By January 16, 2017 “The V5 Plus will flaunt a dual front camera setup with 20MP + 8MP sensors” 
vivo is all set to unveil its latest V series smartphone called the V5 Plus in India on January 23rd. Ahead of the unveiling in India, the phone is already up for pre-order in Malaysia. The phone is priced at RM 1,799, around Rs 27,400, and is up for pre-order on Malaysian retailer DirectD. The retailer will start shipping the handset from January 21st. 
The listing on the retailer reveals that the vivo V5 Plus will boast a dual front camera setup that includes 20MP and 8MP sensors. At the rear, the phone will feature a 16MP primary snapper. It will come with a 5.5-inch full HD display, an octa-core Snapdragon 625 SoC, 4GB of RAM, 64GB of storage, Android Marshmallow, and a 3,160mAh battery with fast charging support. 
We will have the vivo V5 Plus’ price and availability for India next week, so watch this space for regular updates.
